title: All of my hextech loot including my essences are gone
body: i had 2 skin shard about 2k orange essence and like 70 blue essence my 7 hextech boxes and everything just dissappeared today can i ask why? i was saving for a 3rd shard but i guess not anymore?

replies.body:
*Wolfess* is spot-on with their assessment of the situation. I would also recommend changing your account password to prevent any unauthorized access. If you reach out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), one of our account specialists will work with you to sort this out.

Let me know if you have any questions.

if you know how to, go to the store and check your transaction history.
if you see any strange purchases or things gotten for zero RP, your account may have been compromised and someone else messed with your hextech stuff.
If that is indeed the case, do a full virus/malware scan on your computer and then AFTER that change your password.

after that you can try submitting a ticket and see if perhaps some of it could be retrievable, no guarantees though.


if that was not the case, maybe wait and see if someone from support drops in here and has some further insight.
